citations.narrative:
The ceiling of the sugar glider indoor housing area has a brown accumulation, the walls have a sticky film and the
windows have some dead fruit flies that require removal. All areas in the sugar gliders indoor housing shall be
thoroughly cleaned including the ceiling , the walls and the windows in order to reduce odors and prevent insects.
Clean all areas that are dirty.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with owner.

narrative:
3.131(c)                    REPEAT
SANITATION.   
The ceiling of the sugar glider indoor housing area has a brown accumulation, the walls have a sticky film and the
windows have some dead fruit flies that require removal. All areas in the sugar gliders indoor housing shall be
thoroughly cleaned including the ceiling , the walls and the windows in order to reduce odors and prevent insects.
Clean all areas that are dirty.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with owner.
